templates.name: Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement
templates.description: A standard mutual NDA for protecting confidential information exchanged between two parties evaluating a potential business relationship.

templates.name: Mutual NDA Cover Page
templates.description: Cover page template for the Mutual NDA containing customizable terms like effective date, term length, and governing law.

templates.name: Cloud Service Agreement
templates.description: A comprehensive agreement for selling and buying cloud software and SaaS products, covering access, payment, security, liability, and confidentiality.

templates.name: Design Partner Agreement
templates.description: An agreement for early product access where partners provide feedback in exchange for using pre-release software, helping vendors develop and improve their products.

templates.name: Service Level Agreement
templates.description: A standard SLA defining uptime targets, response time commitments, service credits, and remedies for cloud service providers.

templates.name: Professional Services Agreement
templates.description: An agreement for professional services engagements covering deliverables, intellectual property, payment terms, and project management.

templates.name: Partnership Agreement
templates.description: A standard agreement for business partnerships covering cooperation obligations, trademark licensing, fees, confidentiality, and liability.

templates.name: Software License Agreement
templates.description: A comprehensive license agreement for on-premise or installable software, covering licensing terms, restrictions, warranties, and support.

templates.name: Data Processing Agreement
templates.description: A GDPR-compliant data processing agreement covering data protection obligations, subprocessors, international transfers, and security requirements.

templates.name: Pilot Agreement
templates.description: A short-term trial or evaluation agreement allowing prospective customers to test a product before committing to a longer-term deal.

templates.name: Business Associate Agreement
templates.description: A HIPAA-compliant agreement for business associates handling protected health information (PHI), covering privacy, security, and breach notification requirements.

templates.name: AI Addendum
templates.description: An addendum for agreements involving AI/ML features, covering input/output ownership, model training restrictions, and AI-specific disclaimers.
